#include<cstdio>
const int n=100000;
int T,N,M,i,X,U,V,p;
double Ans;
int son[n],d[n],ed[2*n],next[2*n];
void Addedge(int i,int j)
{
	ed[++p]=j,next[p]=son[i],son[i]=p;
}
void dfs(int i,int last,double res)
{
	int j;
	Ans+=res/(res+1);
	for(j=son[i];j;j=next[j])
		if(ed[j]!=last)
			dfs(ed[j],i,res+d[i]);
}
int main()
{
	for(scanf("%d",&T);T--;)
	{
		scanf("%d",&N);
		for(i=1;i<=N;++i) son[i]=d[i]=0;
		p=0;
		for(i=1;i<N;++i)
		{
			scanf("%d%d",&U,&V);
			Addedge(U,V),Addedge(V,U);
		}
		scanf("%d",&M);
		for(i=1;i<=M;++i)
		{
			scanf("%d",&X);
			d[X]=1;
		}
		Ans=0;
		dfs(1,0,0);
		printf("%.10lf\n",Ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
